message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I've done my research and I believe $1000000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but if not, I'll have to consider purchasing the product from another seller.

I understand you've done your research, Bob, but I'm afraid $1000000 is below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1200000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.
